verses.verse: And there <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H4480>beside<s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham.<s%> And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> unto <S%H1642>Gerar.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> Go not <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H408><s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I shall <S%H559>tell<s%> thee of: <S%H413><s%>

Sojourn <S%H1481><s%> in <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and I will <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee, and will <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee; <S%H3588>for<s%> unto thee, and unto thy <S%H2233>seed,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H776>countries,<s%> and I will <S%H6965>perform<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7621>oath<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%> thy <S%H1>father;<s%>

And I will <S%H853>make<s%> thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> to <S%H7235>multiply<s%> as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> unto thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H776>countries;<s%> and in thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed;<s%>

Because <S%H6118><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H4931>charge,<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and my <S%H8451>laws.<s%>
And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in Gerar: <S%H1642><s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> him of his <S%H802>wife;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1931>She<s%> is my <S%H269>sister:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he <S%H3372>feared<s%> to <S%H559>say,<s%> She is my <S%H802>wife;<s%> <S%H6435>lest,<s%> said he, the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> should <S%H2026>kill<s%> me <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> was <S%H2896>fair<s%> to look <S%H4758>upon.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he had been <S%H8033>there<s%> a <S%H748>long<s%> <S%H3117>time,<s%> that <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> looked <S%H8259>out<s%> <S%H1157>at<s%> a <S%H2474>window,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H6711>sporting<s%> <S%H853>with<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> his <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> of a <S%H389>surety<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> is thy <S%H802>wife:<s%> and <S%H349>how<s%> <S%H559>saidst<s%> thou, <S%H1931>She<s%> is my <S%H269>sister?<s%> And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H3588>Because<s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6435>Lest<s%> I <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> her.

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is <S%H2063>this<s%> thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%> unto us? <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> might <S%H4592>lightly<s%> have <S%H7901>lain<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thy <S%H802>wife,<s%> and thou shouldest have <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H817>guiltiness<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> us.

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H6680>charged<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> He that <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> or his <S%H802>wife<s%> shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%> <S%H4191><s%>

Then <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H2232>sowed<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H4672>received<s%> in the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> a <S%H3967>hundredfold:<s%> <S%H8180><s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him.
And the <S%H376>man<s%> waxed <S%H1431>great,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H1980>forward,<s%> and <S%H1432>grew<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H3588><s%> he became very <S%H1431>great:<s%> <S%H3966><s%>

For he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H4735>possession<s%> of <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and <S%H4735>possession<s%> of <S%H1241>herds,<s%> and great <S%H7227>store<s%> of <S%H5657>servants:<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7065>envied<s%> him.

For <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H875>wells<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> had <S%H2658>digged<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H5640>stopped<s%> them, and <S%H4390>filled<s%> them with <S%H6083>earth.<s%>

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> <S%H1980>Go<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> us; <S%H3588>for<s%> thou art much <S%H6105>mightier<s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> we.

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H1980>departed<s%> <S%H4480>thence,<s%> <S%H8033><s%> and pitched his <S%H2583>tent<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H1642>Gerar,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H2658>digged<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H875>wells<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H2658>digged<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> his <S%H1>father;<s%> for the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H5640>stopped<s%> them <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham:<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> their <S%H8034>names<s%> after the <S%H8034>names<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H7121>called<s%> them.

And <S%H3327>Isaac's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H2658>digged<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> a <S%H875>well<s%> of <S%H2416>springing<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And the <S%H7462>herdsmen<s%> of <S%H1642>Gerar<s%> did <S%H7378>strive<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac's<s%> <S%H7462>herdsmen,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H4325>water<s%> is ours: and he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H875>well<s%> <S%H6230>Esek;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they <S%H6229>strove<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him.

And they <S%H2658>digged<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H875>well,<s%> and <S%H7378>strove<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> that <S%H1571>also:<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of it <S%H7856>Sitnah.<s%>

And he <S%H6275>removed<s%> from <S%H4480>thence,<s%> <S%H8033><s%> and <S%H2658>digged<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H875>well;<s%> and <S%H5921>for<s%> that they <S%H7378>strove<s%> <S%H3808>not:<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of it <S%H7344>Rehoboth;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>For<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath made <S%H7337>room<s%> for us, and we shall be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>
And he went <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> to <S%H884>Beer-sheba.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> thy <S%H1>father:<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H408>not,<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am <S%H854>with<s%> thee, and will <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H5668>for<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H85>Abraham's<s%> sake.

And he <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H8033>there:<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H3738>digged<s%> a <S%H875>well.<s%>

Then <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> him from <S%H4480>Gerar,<s%> <S%H1642><s%> and <S%H276>Ahuzzath<s%> one of his <S%H4828>friends,<s%> and <S%H6369>Phichol<s%> the chief <S%H8269>captain<s%> of his <S%H6635>army.<s%>

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H4069>Wherefore<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> ye <S%H413>to<s%> me, seeing <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> me, and have sent me <S%H7971>away<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> you?

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> We saw <S%H7200>certainly<s%> <S%H7200><s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee: and we <S%H559>said,<s%> Let there <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> an <S%H423>oath<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> us, even <S%H996>between<s%> us and thee, and let us <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee;

That <S%H518><s%> thou wilt <S%H6213>do<s%> us no <S%H7451>hurt,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> we have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5060>touched<s%> thee, and <S%H834>as<s%> we have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H5973>unto<s%> thee nothing <S%H7535>but<s%> <S%H2896>good,<s%> and have sent thee <S%H7971>away<s%> in <S%H7965>peace:<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art <S%H6258>now<s%> the <S%H1288>blessed<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> them a <S%H4960>feast,<s%> and they did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

And they rose up <S%H7925>quickly<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H7650>swore<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another:<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> sent them <S%H7971>away,<s%> and they <S%H1980>departed<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> him in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H3327>Isaac's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> him <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H182><s%> the <S%H875>well<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H2658>digged,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, We have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And he <S%H7121>called<s%> it <S%H7656>Shebah:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H3947>took<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3067>Judith<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H882>Beeri<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> and <S%H1315>Bashemath<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H356>Elon<s%> the Hittite: <S%H2850><s%>
Which <S%H1961>were<s%> a <S%H4786>grief<s%> of <S%H7307>mind<s%> unto <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> and to <S%H7259>Rebekah.<s%>
